name: Bacon Ranch Cheese Ball
author: wifey110
summary: This cheese ball was a big hit at our office Christmas party! I had cream cheese left over and decided to start adding ingredients and it was wonderful!
ingredients: 1 (1 ounce) package buttermilk Ranch dressing mix
½ cup shredded sharp Cheddar cheese
directions: Place the bacon in a large, deep skillet, and cook over medium-high heat, turning occasionally, until evenly browned, about 10 minutes
Drain the bacon slices on a paper towel-lined plate
Chop the cooled bacon into small pieces
Stir together the cream cheese and ranch dressing mix in a bowl until smooth
Add the bacon, Cheddar cheese, green onions, and olives; stir until well combined
Shape the mixture into a ball and roll in the chopped pecans
